reviewText: Please refer to the review I wrote for " The Romance of the Rio Grande". That review is how I feel about any and all roles in which Cesar Romero played or starred in. I love the confidence he displayed in his characters. He seems to have been that way in real life. I am biased concerning Mr Romero. Any movie he is in will always rate a five-star from me. The movie "Frontier Marshall"  with Randolph Scott, Romero as Doc Holiday is him at his BEST!
Ceasar Romero is a great Cisco Kid.  He was also a great actor.  His humor as Cisco makes the movie And as a ladies man he is quite the philospher.  A fun movie.
